title: GDG DevFest 2016 Announced
brief: Belgian Google Developers Groups are proud to announce the latest edition of the annual GDG DevFest 2016 which is the biggest Google related event in Belgium carefully crafted by GDG community! The event will take place on **22-23rd of October** in **Brussels**.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: GDG DevFest Belgium 2016 announced! The biggest conference about Google technologies in Belgium will take on **October 22-23** in Brussels. That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](https://goo.gl/forms/3rj8TUpF8CVtvKks1).

title: Supported by Tapptic
brief: We are happy to have Tapptic as a sponsor for DevFest. Thank you for making the event happen!

title: Partnering with ng-be
brief: If you are interested in DevFest you might be first Angular Conference in Belgium taking place in December.
